publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5386.3 Robin Harper: Education with specific reference to Skills Academiesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-5386) in the name of Murdo Fraser, leave out from "be they stand-alone" to end and insert "but believes that investment in extending access to vocational skills should first be delivered at a local level throughout Scotland before considering the advisability of investing in dedicated institutions outwith the comprehensive system."
